name: Retractable Claws
summary: You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage.
description:
You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage. Your claws are in the brawling group and have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits.Traits

Kitsune: Shapeshifting humanoids whose true forms resemble foxes.
